subject: [junit] No tests found in  my   testcase  unable to understand why ?
msgSnippet: Here is my test case package com.uprr.app.csr.manager; import com.uprr.app.csr.dao.hibernate.impl.BaseDAOTestCase; public class StorageRequestManagerTest
messageBody:
Here is my test case
package com.uprr.app.csr.manager;

import com.uprr.app.csr.dao.hibernate.impl.BaseDAOTestCase;

public class StorageRequestManagerTest extends BaseDAOTestCase {

StorageRequestManager storageRequestManager=null;

protected void setUp() throws Exception {
storageRequestManager = (StorageRequestManager)
ctx.getBean("storageRequestManager");
}

protected void tearDown() throws Exception {
storageRequestManager = null;
}


public void testgetStatus(Long storageRequestId) throws Exception{
storageRequestManager.updatePseudoDemandStatus(new Long(596));
assertEquals("true", "true");
}

public void testcreatePseudoDemandRequest(Long storageRequestId) {
try {
storageRequestManager.createPseudoDemandRequest(new Long(567));
} catch (Exception e) {
}
}

public static void main(String[] args) {
junit.textui.TestRunner.run(StorageRequestManagerTest.class);
}

}

when I run this teast case I get junit.framework.AssertionFailedError: No
tests found in com.uprr.app.csr.manager.StorageRequestManagerTest
below is the stacktrace, Please help me why junit is not finding test .
